bill.title: Municipal special sales tax; remove requirement that expenditure of revenue comply with a commission master plan.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-241, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Levy Of A Municipal Special Sales Tax In Certain Municipalities, To Remove The Provision That Requires A Municipality To Appoint A Commission That Will, With Input From The Municipality, Establish A Master Plan For Road And Street Repair, Reconstruction And Resurfacing Projects And Water, Sewer And Drainage Projects, And That Expenditures Of The Revenue From The Special Tax May Be Made By The Governing Authorities Of The Municipality If The Expenditures Comply With The Master Plan; And For Related Purposes.
